plot: A biracial boy with an abusive father grows up to be an emotionally stunted superhero impersonator whose daily struggle with the fear of confrontation leads to a life changing event.
title: Someday Hero
plot_es: A biracial boy with an abusive father grows up to be an emotionally stunted superhero impersonator whose daily struggle with the fear of confrontation leads to a life changing event.
plot_en: A biracial boy with an abusive father grows up to be an emotionally stunted superhero impersonator whose daily struggle with the fear of confrontation leads to a life changing event.
